subsection_content: After the skin is injured, keloid scars can form 3 – 12 months or longer. Thickened skin is the first sign of keloids, about 20% of keloids appear one year after injury.
subsection_title: seo loi.json. Development time of keloid scars
subsection_data:
seo loi.json. Development time of keloid scars
After the skin is injured, keloid scars can form 3 – 12 months or longer. Thickened skin is the first sign of keloids, about 20% of keloids appear one year after injury.
